---
name: Feature request
about: Suggest an idea
title: "[FEATURE] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ""
---

## What's the problem?

What problem are you trying to solve? What's annoying you right now?

Example: "I can't update all my packages at once, I have to do them one by one."

## What would help?

How would you like to solve this? What should the solution look like?

Example: "A `mosaic update-all` command that updates everything to the latest version."

## Alternatives

Have you thought of workarounds? Are there other ways to do this?

## Additional context

Anything else? Screenshots, related issues, etc.
